query: What is our API response time SLA?
expected_answer: Our API response time SLA is 200ms for 95% of requests and 500ms for 99% of requests, with 99.9% uptime guarantee.
context: Service Level Agreement: API response times must be under 200ms for 95th percentile
99th percentile response time target is 500ms or less
System uptime guarantee: 99.9% availability with automated failover
Monitoring: Real-time performance tracking with alerting
Irrelevant context: Our office hours are 9 AM to 5 PM EST

query: How do I cancel my subscription?
expected_answer: To cancel your subscription, go to Account Settings > Billing, click 'Cancel Subscription', and confirm. Cancellation takes effect at the end of your current billing period.
context: Subscription Management: Access via Account Settings > Billing section
Click 'Cancel Subscription' button and confirm your decision
Cancellation effective at end of current billing period
No refunds for partial months unless within 30-day guarantee
Unrelated: We also offer consulting services for enterprise clients
Irrelevant: Our headquarters is located in San Francisco

query: What programming frameworks does your platform support?
expected_answer: Our platform supports React, Vue.js, Angular for frontend, and Node.js, Python Django, Ruby on Rails for backend development.
context: Supported Frontend Frameworks: React 16+, Vue.js 2.x/3.x, Angular 10+
Backend Framework Support: Node.js with Express, Python Django/Flask, Ruby on Rails
Additional tools: Webpack, Babel, TypeScript compilation supported
Database integrations: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB drivers available
Off-topic: Our company was founded in 2018
Irrelevant: We have offices in 12 countries worldwide

query: What are the data export options?
expected_answer: Data can be exported in CSV, JSON, and XML formats via API or dashboard, with scheduled exports available for premium accounts.
context: Export Formats: CSV, JSON, XML supported for all data types
Export Methods: Manual download from dashboard or automated via API
Scheduled Exports: Available for premium accounts with daily/weekly/monthly options
Data retention: Exports available for download for 30 days
Unrelated information: Our customer support team speaks 15 languages
Irrelevant: We sponsor local tech meetups

query: What security certifications do you have?
expected_answer: We hold SOC 2 Type II, ISO 27001, and GDPR compliance certifications, with annual third-party security audits.
context: Security Certifications: SOC 2 Type II certified annually since 2020
ISO 27001 information security management certification current
GDPR compliance verified by external auditor quarterly
Third-party security audits conducted annually by independent firms
Irrelevant context: Our CEO has 20 years of industry experience
Off-topic: We offer free training webinars every month
